description: This is an example in English.

companyInfo.companyDescription: SCS, short for Standard Cooling Systems, is an A.I. computing development platform specializing in the design of high efficiency Thermal Management Systems.
companyInfo.longDescription: SCS is committed to using the highest technical design capabilities to create innovations with unique high-efficiency cooling system design technologies and A.I. development know-how. Since its establishment in September 2021, SCS has received 1.3 billion won in investment so far, and is tasked with bringing innovative changes to the Electric charging market. Despite its relatively young age, SCS has achieved numerous degrees of success. SCS is not just about designing the best cooling systems but with new technologies we are focused to make a difference in the industry. SCS is a game changer. We believe in complete communication within our company to ensure a smooth flow of information from top to bottom.
companyInfo.advancementsTitle: SCS is continually proving its ability by conducting advancements in
companyInfo.techDevelopment: We are working to develop the best technology in the industry
companyInfo.paradigmShift: We want to lead a paradigm shift in the electrification sector such as
companyInfo.industries: charging industries, electric boats, and electric heavy industries

listItems.content: A.I. Controller Development Complete (Ready for Mass Production)
A Factory in Korea & US each
Battery/Data center OEM PRE-PJT & Product delivery to SK on, EDOM, Premier Logitech, etc.
